How to play Basketball Stars?
Player One
WASD - Move
B - Shoot/Perform action
S - Pump
V - Super-shot
D twice - Dash

Player Two
Arrow keys - Move
L - Shoot/Perform action
DOWN Arrow - Pump
K - Super-shot
LEFT Arrow twice - Dash
